=== Object Collections ===
Contributors: frankieroberto
Tags: museum, collections
Stable tag: 1.0
Requires at least: 3.0
Tested up to: 3.0

Adds 'objects' as a type of page you can edit within Wordpress. Suitable for use by collectors or small museums.

== Changelog ==

= 0.1 =

* Initial version, using custom UI screens (mostly copied from the existing Wordpress page editing interface).

= 1.0 =
* Rewritten to use new custom post types and auto-generated admin UI.
